title: "Researchers ‘Drop the Zeroes’ to Speed Deep Learning"
excerpt: "Researchers at the King Abdullah University of Science and Technology (KAUST) are now proposing a method of accelerating distributed deep learning by dropping data blocks with zero values, which are frequently produced during distributed machine learning processes that use large datasets."
